message: A perfect spot to share my talented friend, Steve Eaton's great anti-Koch Brothers protest song!! (feel free to share it....I don't think he'd mind...just getting the message out thru' the gift of his music check it out!:

I truly believe that our Government is trying to divide us .Some might think it sounds crazy but if you divide the population you break it. Thus it is easier for those at the top to have greater control over all of us . Someday soon I believe we will come see the reality of this. United we stand divided we fall. This way how can the masses work together when Uncle Sam becomes totalitarian : a system of government that is centralized and dictatorial and requires complete subservience to the state. Sounds like what DC wants to do to us pawns.
